mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu(menu_name, parent_id, order_num, router_path, component_url, menu_type, visible, status, permission, icon, create_by, update_by) VALUES (#{menuName}, #{parentId}, #{orderNum}, #{routerPath}, #{componentUrl}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{permission}, #{icon}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy})
mapper.select: SELECT menu_id, menu_name FROM sys_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} and menu_name = #{menuName} and deleted = 0
mapper.update:
update sys_menu
menu_name = #{menuName},
parent_id = #{parentId},
order_num = #{orderNum},
router_path = #{routerPath},
component_url = #{componentUrl},
menu_type = #{menuType},
component_url = #{componentUrl},
visible = #{visible},
status = #{status},
permission = #{permission},
icon = #{icon},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, router_path, component_url, menu_type, visible, status, permission, icon from sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId}

select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, router_path, component_url, menu_type, visible, status, permission, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_menu where deleted = 0 order by order_num limit #{index}, #{pageSize}

select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, router_path, component_url, menu_type, visible, status, permission, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_menu where deleted = 0 order by order_num

select m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id from sys_menu as m left join sys_role_menu srm on m.menu_id = srm.menu_id where m.deleted = 0 and srm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.menu_id not in ( select tm.parent_id from sys_menu tm inner join sys_role_menu s on tm.menu_id = s.menu_id and s.role_id = #{roleId} where tm.deleted = 0 )
